dct_title_s: Ceretica sive Cardiganensis comitatus: Cardigan schire.; Ceretica sive Cardiganensis comitatvs: Cardigan schire;Ceredigion;Cardiganshire
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Includes illustrations of ships in the ocean and a decorative title cartouche topped with a blank coat of arms in the top right corner, as well as a blank cartouche with a sphere atop it in the lower right corner. Printing includes extensive flourishes. Does not match any states listed in Van der Krogt. From the Jansson Appendix Atlas 1636-1680, title created to represent a unique collection within the Clark Library, University of Michigan. 1 map; 37 x 48 cm.
dct_rights_sm: This map is in the public domain.
dct_rightsHolder_sm: Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library. https://www.lib.umich.edu/about-us/policies/copyright-policy
